title: Mixed Green Salad with Mango, Jícama and Cashews
directions: Combine 1/2 cup mango with next 6 ingredients in blender. Puree until smooth. Season dressing with salt and pepper. Transfer to small bowl. (Can be made 3 hours ahead. Cover; let stand at room temperature.)
Combine lettuces, jicama and remaining 1 cup mango in large bowl. Toss with enough dressing to coat. Sprinkle with cashews. Serve, passing any remaining dressing separately.
ingredients: 1 large ripe mango, peeled, pitted, cut into ¤-inch pieces (about 1 1/2 cups)
3 tablespoons rice vinegar or 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar
